item.title: Indian Parliamentary Election 2019 - Part 2- Final Results
item.description: The figure below shows the actual results when the results were counted on 23rd May 2019. The results were overwhelminghly in favor of BJP led NDA (National Democratic Alliance). I would gradually add more analysis figures based on the actual outcomes and basis the data from election commission of India, so stay tuned!

item.title: Indian Parliamentary Election 2019 - Part 1-Exit Polls
